steps.title: [32mðŸ”Œ Convex Setup[0m
steps.description: Set up your real-time backend for workspace collaboration
instructions:
1. Visit [34mhttps://dashboard.convex.dev[0m and create an account
2. Create a new project named after your workspace (e.g., 'workspace-manager')
3. In the project dashboard:
   - Go to Settings > URL & Deploy Key
   - Copy your unique deployment URL
   - Format: [34mhttps://[project-id].convex.cloud[0m
4. This URL will power your real-time data sync and authentication

steps.title: [32mðŸ”‘ GitHub Authentication[0m
steps.description: Enable secure workspace access with GitHub authentication
instructions:
1. Go to [34mhttps://github.com/settings/developers[0m
2. Click 'New OAuth App'
3. Configure your application:
   - Name: Your Workspace Manager
   - Homepage URL: [34m{{NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL}}[0m
   - Authorization callback URL: [34m{{convexSiteUrl}}/api/auth/github/callback[0m
4. After registration:
   - Save your Client ID
   - Generate and save your Client Secret
   - These credentials will enable secure user authentication

steps.title: [32mðŸ’³ Polar Integration[0m
steps.description: Configure Polar for workspace subscription handling
instructions:
1. Create your account at [34mhttps://polar.sh[0m
2. Set up your organization:
   - Click 'Sell with Polar'
   - For development: Use [34mhttps://sandbox.polar.sh/dashboard/create[0m
3. Configure your integration:
   - Organization ID: Settings > General > Organization
   - Access Token: Settings > Developers (enable all permissions)
   - Webhook: Settings > Webhooks
     â€¢ URL: [34m{{convexSiteUrl}}/payments/webhook[0m
     â€¢ Events: Select all subscription and payment events
     â€¢ Format: Raw
4. These settings will enable workspace subscription management

steps.title: [32mðŸ“§ Resend Email Service[0m
steps.description: Set up Resend for workspace notifications and invites
instructions:
1. Sign up at [34mhttps://resend.com[0m
2. Configure your API access:
   - Go to API Keys
   - Create a new key (starts with 're_')
3. Set up email sending:
   - Add and verify your domain in Settings
   - Or use the sandbox domain for testing
4. This will enable:
   - Workspace invitation emails
   - Task notifications
   - Subscription updates
